review: I've researched a lot of streaming devices, for gifts and for myself.  I settled on a Roku for my roommate for Christmas, but for me I wanted something different.  The Chromecast wasn't an option, so I was down to AppleTV & Fire TV Stick.  The Fire TV won out by a long run.  You can't add apps to the AppleTV, nor play games on it, nor does it have a Prime app.  I got my Fire TV Stick today and absolutely love it!  It's faster with more storage (which helps with a lot less buffering), and is a breeze to navigate.  (I found the Roku navigation a bit jumbled.)  The remote reaction is a lot better than that of AppleTV or Roku, as well.  It's the best value for the power out there.
author: Ernest
